movie.title: Gold
movie.plot: Set in 1948, the historic story of India's first Olympic medal post their independence.

events.title: the body of Nicholas Markowitz, who Zack Mazursky is based on, is found in a shallow grave

movie.title: Alpha Dog
movie.plot: Johnny Truelove likes to see himself as tough. He's the son of an underworld figure and a drug dealer. Johnny also likes to get tough when things don't go his way. When Jake Mazursky fails to pay up for Johnny, things get worse for the Mazursky family, as Johnny and his 'gang' kidnap Jake's 15 year old brother and holds him hostage. Problem now is what to do with 'stolen boy?'

events.title: Julie Powell cooks her last recipe, stuffed duck in pastry

movie.title: Julie & Julia
movie.plot: Julia Child and Julie Powell – both of whom wrote memoirs – find their lives intertwined. Though separated by time and space, both women are at loose ends... until they discover that with the right combination of passion, fearlessness and butter, anything is possible.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 24 wins & 46 nominations.
